title: Asking for Directions: Locations (Usefulness 10)
description: Traveler usefulness 10/10 phrases for the Locations subcategory within Asking for Directions. Includes 4 card(s).

cards.romaji: Shibuya eki wa doko desu ka?

cards.english: Is there a convenience store around here?
cards.romaji: Konbini wa chikaku ni arimasu ka?
cards.japanese: コンビニは近くにありますか？

cards.english: Is there a convenience store nearby?
cards.romaji: Konbini wa chikaku ni arimasu ka.
cards.japanese: コンビニは近くにありますか？
